A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This makes the prequels (Episodes 1 - 3) look good. Rian Johnson destroyed the story line in favor of some social justice agenda. I also don't see why he made Hux out to be some idiot. The First Order is supposed to command fear and intimidation. Rian did the opposite. But worst of all is what they did with Luke's character. They made him out to be some crazy hermit rather than focusing on his legend of being a great Jedi.
